item.description:
Magician Marco Tempests says that magicians are the only honest ones.

 

A magician promises to deceive you.... and he does!

 

Check out his view on deception, magic, and lies:

 

 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jvXqXcVF5S8&feature=youtube_gdata_player

 

How honest are we?   Are men more deceitful than women? When is it acceptable to lie?  What is the role of lying in our culture? What sort of white lies, deceptions, etc are OK, and what crosses the line?

 

Come join us for another Inquisitive Minds discussion, this time on lies, deceit, and perhaps just a little truth about human nature? 

 

As part of this discussion, the moderator (a/k/a Jim), will have a number of challenging ethical questions for group on honesty and lies.

Note: after the discussion, we'll head up to Orleans for some adult beverages and some honest sharing, or a wee bit of friendly lying.  ;-)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the large table all the way in back.
item.name: Would I lie to you?
